Entry.Translation: Kann zu link(TRAIT_HERO_ARCHETYPE), link(TRAIT_COMMANDER_ARCHETYPE), link(TRAIT_TACTICIAN_ARCHETYPE), link(TRAIT_ZEALOT_ARCHETYPE), link(TRAIT_SCHEMER_ARCHETYPE), oder eventuell zu link(TRAIT_CORRUPTIONIST_ARCHETYPE) und link(TRAIT_CHAMPION_ARCHETYPE) f端hren.

Kann zu link(TRAIT_HERO_ARCHETYPE), link(TRAIT_ORATOR_ARCHETYPE), link(TRAIT_JUDGE_ARCHETYPE), link(TRAIT_SCHOLAR_ARCHETYPE), link(TRAIT_DIPLOMAT_ARCHETYPE), link(TRAIT_ARTIST_ARCHETYPE), link(TRAIT_MERCHANT_ARCHETYPE) oder eventuell zu link(TRAIT_SKYEXPLORER_ARCHETYPE) und link(TRAIT_CORRUPTIONIST_ARCHETYPE) f端hren.
